resources.string: GitHub Wikis is a simple way to let others contribute content. Any GitHub user can create and edit pages to use for documentation, examples, support, or anything you wish.
Simple RecyclerView with Vertical LinearLayoutManager. All items are mixed Text-Video.
Simple RecyclerView with Vertical LinearLayoutManager. Contains only one Video at a specific position.
Simple RecyclerView with Vertical StaggeredGridLayoutManager. All items are Videos.
RecyclerView with Vertical GridLayoutManager, custom span size. Items are mixed between Text only, Video only and both Text and Video.

2 Separated RecyclerViews in same layout: 

 - Top RecyclerView with Horizontal LinearLayoutManager. Items are mixed from Video-only and Video-Text items. 

 - Bottom RecyclerView with Vertical StaggeredGridLayoutManager.Items are all Videos.
Very simple implementation for a Video List. a RecyclerView with Vertical LinearLayoutManager, simple Video list.
A test with Youtube Videos, using Youtube Player API. Still unstable and need more improvement.
ViewPager, contains 2 fragments. Each fragment is a single RecyclerView.
Simple RecyclerView with Vertical LinearLayoutManager. All items are mixed Text-Video. Auto-playback is toggle-able by Toggle button.
